data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anderson, Robert S. (2013): Two new species of Dryophthorinae in the genera Metamasius and Melchus from the Lesser Antilles (Coleoptera: Curculionidae). Zootaxa 3750 (4): 396-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.4.9
